rows.text_1: Let’s check in on another family to see how the mother praises her son, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name during One-on-One Time.

rows.text_2: @data.characters.f3_mother.name: “You found a striped sock and one with dots. Let’s find the socks that match those two.”
@data.characters.f3_mother.name: “Another sock! This one is white. It isn’t easy finding a matching pair. It can be frustrating.”
@data.characters.f3_mother.name: “You are being very patient and looking very hard, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name. Well done for trying. I feel so happy when you are helping me.”

@data.characters.f3_mother.name: “You found two socks with the same pattern! Well done for looking, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name! 

Because you helped me so well, I have 5 extra minutes to play your favourite game together.”
